publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care WG and Community-Based Care and Privacy WG

description.value: For Post-Acute Care Settings, the MDS/OASIS Self Care or Mobility question code

display.value: Independent - Patient completed the activities by him/herself, with or without an assistive device, with no assistance from a helper.

definition.value: Independent - Patient completed the activities by him/herself, with or without an assistive device, with no assistance from a helper.

display.value: Needed some help - Patient needed partial assistance from another person to complete activities.

definition.value: Needed some help - Patient needed partial assistance from another person to complete activities.

display.value: Dependent - A helper completed the activities for the patient.

definition.value: Dependent - A helper completed the activities for the patient.
